subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Ramzee Robinson, who earned the title Mr. Irrelevant as the final player selected in the 2007 N.F.L. draft, agreed on a three-year contract with the Detroit Lions, his agent said. Robinson, a cornerback, was the last of 255 players selected in April. Financial terms were not disclosed.
